Articles.Content:
Hi fellow Kerbals!! 

Just a room to exchange funny Kerbal jokes! 

So for starters, here's mine: 

A blind Kerbal walks into a bar. And a table. And a chair
Hi this post should really be in the games forum ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I read this in somebodies signature:

What is green and flies through space?

 - A salatellite

What do you call the act of blending ingredients together while crying?

A boo-stir! 

.

.

.

.

.

.

I've hit an all time low.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=egkykvyCu38](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=egkykvyCu38)
  
They could have just reverted the mission...
Nope. NASA plays on hard mode.
We already have some jokes threads, and so, merged.

Hey Jeb wanna hear a joke?

What?

Our space program.

What do kerbals' measure energy in?

Jools.

ok, here's mine (its terrible)

Whats green, laughs, and is going mach 10?

Jeb ontop of a SRB.

=p
What do you get when you cross Mystery Goo with the Materials Bay? A new Kerbal!

How many Kerbals does it take to screw in a lightbulb? 

Just one, to use an EMU and hold the lightbulb in place. While a few million SRB's spin Kerbin.

What do you get when you mix Pol and a ball?

Pol-and-ball. What have I done?

> 
> What do you get when you mix Pol and a ball?
> Pol-and-ball. What have I done?

Hehehehehe. Polandball.

What is returning from Eve called?

Imagination.

What jewel is the greenest?

Jool, of course!
Why are female kerbals sighning up now? They want their shiny Jools!
